name: Misc
short: Miscellaneous server utilities including mass role management.
description: Provides miscellaneous server administration utilities including commands to add or remove roles from all server members at once.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
You've just installed the Misc cog!
Type `[p]help massrole` to get started with mass role management commands.
author: MatthewTWG
